Package ca.team4308.absolutelib.subsystems

Class Arm

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase
ca.team4308.absolutelib.wrapper.AbsoluteSubsystem
ca.team4308.absolutelib.subsystems.Arm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sendable, Subsystem
public class Arm extends AbsoluteSubsystem
Multi-DOF Arm subsystem: per-joint modes (IDLE, MANUAL, POSITION, HOLDING) with IK support

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Arm.Joint
    A single rotary joint in the arm, with PID, feedforward, and output filtering.
    static class 
    Arm.JointConfig
    Immutable configuration for an arm joint.

    • setTargetAngles

      public void setTargetAngles(double... radians)
      Sets target angles (in radians) for each joint directly, disabling IK mode.
      Parameters:
